channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The maid of honor approved my bridesmaid’s dress, but now wants me to buy a new one. What should I do?
item.description: “While I’d like to push back more, I know myself and will end up caving and buying a new dress.”

item.title: Marvell’s stock falls in the wake of these two competitive concerns
item.description: There are new fears on Wall Street related to the future of Marvell’s work with Amazon and its potential to capitalize on opportunity with Microsoft.

item.title: ‘I don’t have money to pay for a death certificate’: My sister refuses to probate my father’s estate. What can I do?
item.description: “I recently received paperwork from a company that my father had invested in.”

item.title: ‘I love my work’: I’m a 61-year-old Chicago public-school teacher with a $60K annual pension. Is it safe?
item.description: “I am aware that my pension as a Chicago public school teacher is dependent on factors that are very much in flux right now.”

item.title: My mother is selling my late father’s multimillion-dollar California real-estate portfolio — must I stand idly by?
Investors can lock in yield in these unique assets as Fed likely lowers rates
item.description: These ETFs, which act like bonds, are an easy way for retail investors to lock in yields and ladder to avoid interest-rate volatility.

item.title: NextEra to build 15 gigawatts of power for data centers by 2035
item.description: NextEra CEO John Ketchum acknowledged that the huge power demand from AI data centers is raising affordability concerns.

item.title: Momentum is on the side of this mining stock that's breaking out, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton of Fairlead Strategies breaks down the charts on this miner.

item.title: Can AI make you the next Warren Buffett? One bank is working to find out
item.description: Deutsche Bank asked its dbLumina AI model to pick a basket of funds.

item.title: NextEra working with Exxon to develop gigawatt data center for hyperscaler
item.description: NextEra plans to pitch the data center site to a hyperscaler. There is no signed agreement with a customer yet.

item.title: JSPR Explodes on Briquilimab Asthma Breakthrough
item.description: JSPR stock surges on positive briquilimab asthma trial data. Explore risks, rewards, and biotech trading lessons as shares gain big early today.

item.title: New Fortress Energy: From Distress to Dominance – The Turnaround Thesis in LNG Infrastructure
item.description: New Fortress Energy Inc. (NASDAQ: NFE), a pioneer in integrated gas-to-power infrastructure, has endured a brutal year. Shares have plummeted over 90%...

item.title: SUPX Surges 11% on $20M Buyback News
